TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomDesignerLoader extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService
Public MustInherit Class CodeDomDesignerLoader Inherits BasicDesignerLoader Implements IDesignerSerializationService, INameCreationService
type CodeDomDesignerLoader = class inherit BasicDesignerLoader interface INameCreationService interface IDesignerSerializationService

summary.span: 提供基底類別，以實作 CodeDOM 設計工具載入器。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing a CodeDOM-based designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象類別，提供完整的設計工具載入器會根據程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM)。 is an abstract class that provides a full designer loader based on the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM). 您提供 CodeDOM 剖析器和產生器和型別解析服務。You provide the CodeDOM parser and generator, and a type resolution service.

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

summary.span: 取得這個設計工具載入器將使用的 。

span.span: Gets the this designer loader will use.

value.span: 這個設計工具載入器將使用的 。

span.span: The this designer loader will use

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具載入器不會剖析或產生程式碼，從傳回，但它會使用提供者取得，它可用來驗證中的名稱建立服務的識別項。The designer loader does not parse or generate code from the returned , but it does use the provider to obtain an that it can use to validate identifiers in the name-creation service. 設計工具載入器也會檢查以查看是否實作介面。The designer loader will also check the to see if it implements the interface. 如需有關剖析或產生程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱和方法。For more information on parsing or generating code, see the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所新增的服務方法。The method removes services added by the method. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化服務。

span.span: Initializes services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述可取代服務將加入至服務容器。The following table describes the replaceable services that the adds to the service container. |詞彙Term|定義Definition| |----------|----------------| ||提供用於建立語意物件的名稱。Provides semantics for creating names of objects. 服務會使用 CodeDOM 提供者的介面來建立是語言的有效識別項的名稱。The service uses the CodeDOM provider's interface to create names that are valid identifiers for the language. 此外，名稱建立服務支援空的名稱。In addition, the name creation service supports empty names. 空白的名稱應該在序列化期間解譯為暫時的區域變數。Empty names should be interpreted as temporary local variables during serialization.| ||允許其他物件序列化成二進位物件的一組元件。Allows other objects to serialize a group of components into a binary object. 這項服務是最常用的功能，例如複製和貼上或復原與取消復原。This service is most often used by features such as copy and paste or undo and redo. 類別提供設計工具序列化服務為基礎建立物件的 CodeDOM 樹狀結構。The class provides a designer serialization service that is based on creating CodeDOM trees for objects.| ||此服務會取代做為要序列化為二進位物件的元件。This service replaces as a means to serialize components to a binary object.| 如需可取代和非可取代服務的詳細資訊，請參閱。For details on replaceable and non-replaceable services, see .

exception.span: 尚未初始化 ，或設計工具載入器未提供 CodeDom 序列化所需要的型別解析服務。

span.span: The has not been initialized, or the designer loader did not supply a type resolution service, which is required for CodeDom serialization.

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

Protected Overrides Function IsReloadNeeded () As Boolean

summary.span: 傳回值，指出重新載入是否必要。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a reload is required.

returns.span: 如果 決定有必要重新載入，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the decides a reload is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否存在介面上。The method checks for the presence of the interface on the . 將重新分析的 CodeDOM 樹狀結構提供者，並將其傳遞至產生的剖析樹狀結構方法。The provider will reparse the CodeDOM tree and pass the resulting parse tree to the method. 如果此方法傳回`false`，就不會重新載入設計工具。If this method returns `false`, the designer will not be reloaded.

exception.span: 語言不提供這個檔案的程式碼剖析器。這個檔案類型可能不支援設計工具。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以設計該類別，但它不是檔案中的第一個類別，或由於無法設計其中任何類別，而無法顯示這個檔案的設計工具。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫需要剖析的原始程式碼。The method is called when the needs to parse the source code. 必須指定的原始程式碼位置和格式，藉由衍生類別。The source code location and format must be specified by deriving classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformFlush(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformFlush (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 從其要求序列化程式的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 要求序列化設計工具的根元件。

span.span: Requests serialization of the root component of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會取得根的設計工具的根元件，並叫用序列化程式序列化元件。The method obtains the root for the root component of the designer and invokes the serializer to serialize the component. 這項作業的結果是否，然後整合與現有的 CodeDOM 樹狀結構。If the result of this operation is a , then integrates the with the existing CodeDOM tree. 結果會以相符的成員和陳述式取代原始的 CodeDOM 樹狀結構。The result is the original CodeDOM tree with matching members and statements replaced. 最後，會呼叫抽象方法來儲存此 CodeDOM 樹狀結構。Finally, calls the abstract method to save this CodeDOM tree. 如果序列化的根設計工具元件不會導致，然後不執行進一步動作。If the serialization of the root designer component does not result in a , then does nothing further. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它負責的呼叫者，以確保 CodeDOM 來自受信任的來源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受來自不受信任的合作對象為 CodeDOM 物件可能會允許該合作對象，執行惡意程式碼。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 當排清到檔案的 CodeDOM，架構就會執行 CodeDOM 物件和序列化的內容所提供之物件所代表的程式碼。When flushing a CodeDOM into a file, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 語言不提供這個檔案的程式碼剖析器。這個檔案類型可能不支援設計工具。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以設計該類別，但它不是檔案中的第一個類別，或由於無法設計其中任何類別，而無法顯示這個檔案的設計工具。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformLoad(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformLoad (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 從其要求序列化程式的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 剖析 CodeDOM 提供者的程式碼。

span.span: Parses code from a CodeDOM provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會取得從 CodeDOM 提供者，並剖析程式碼。The method obtains an from the CodeDOM provider and parses the code. 在檔案中找到的第一個類別，會取得根資料類型，然後再叫用要還原序列化的資料類型的序列化程式。 locates the first class in the file, obtains a root for the data type, and then invokes the serializer to deserialize the data type. 此程序會建立所有必要的元件中會假設的屬性。 assumes that this process will create all necessary components in the of the property. 最後，呼叫方法將它傳遞到 CodeDOM 序列化程式型別的完整名稱。Finally, calls the method with the fully qualified name of the type it passed to the CodeDOM serializer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它負責的呼叫者，以確保 CodeDOM 來自受信任的來源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受來自不受信任的合作對象為 CodeDOM 物件可能會允許該合作對象，執行惡意程式碼。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 當載入設計介面中的 CodeDOM，架構就會執行 CodeDOM 物件和序列化的內容所提供之物件所代表的程式碼。When loading a CodeDOM into the design surface, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 語言不提供這個檔案的程式碼剖析器。這個檔案類型可能不支援設計工具。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以設計該類別，但它不是檔案中的第一個類別，或由於無法設計其中任何類別，而無法顯示這個檔案的設計工具。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

MemberSignature.Value: Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypeResolutionService As ITypeResolutionService

summary.span: 取得要與這個設計工具載入器搭配使用的型別解析服務。

span.span: Gets the type resolution service to be used with this designer loader.

value.span: ，CodeDOM 序列化程式將在解析型別時使用它。

span.span: An that the CodeDOM serializers will use when resolving types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會自動將這至服務容器時叫用方法。The automatically adds this to the service container when the method is invoked. 在許多情況下，選擇性型別解析服務時，它所需的程式碼解譯因為原始程式碼包含型別名稱，而非組件參考。While the type resolution service is optional in many scenarios, it is required for code interpretation because source code contains type names, but no assembly references.

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit unit) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Write (unit As CodeCompileUnit)

span.span: The to be persisted.

summary.span: 將編譯單位變更寫入持續性儲存體。

span.span: Writes compile-unit changes to persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將永續性儲存體。The method saves a to persistent storage. 衍生的類別會負責叫用儲存程式碼，在適當的文字寫入器上。The deriving class is responsible for invoking the on the appropriate text writer to save the code. 可確保傳遞給 CodeDOM 物件都是相同的執行個體的物件，擷取自，序列化程序需要的程式碼進行變更的情況除外。The ensures that the CodeDOM objects that are passed to are the same instances of objects that were retrieved from , except in cases where the serialization process had to make changes to the code. 這可讓其他資料儲存在最佳化的設計工具載入器程式碼項目的屬性。This allows an optimized designer loader to store additional data in the property of code elements. 此資料將可在方法由序列化處理序未取代任何項目。This data will be available during the method for any elements that were not replaced by the serialization process.

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation
